akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 106–345, title II, § 211(2), Oct. 20, 2000, 114 Stat. 1339

akn:content.akn:p:
§§ 300ff–35, 300ff–36. Repealed. Pub. L. 106–345, title II, § 211(2), Oct. 20, 2000, 114 Stat. 1339
Section 300ff–35, act July 1, 1944, ch. 373, title XXVI, § 2627, as added Pub. L. 104–146, § 7(b)(3), May 20, 1996, 110 Stat. 1371, related to testing of pregnant women and newborn infants for HIV disease.
Section 300ff–36, act July 1, 1944, ch. 373, title XXVI, § 2628, as added Pub. L. 104–146, § 7(b)(3), May 20, 1996, 110 Stat. 1372, related to report to Congress by Institute of Medicine.
